content.question: In the sentence, the phrase te discedente specifies

choices.label: why the speaker had been young
how the speaker had been young
when the speaker had been young
where the speaker had been young

content.answer: when the speaker had been young

unit.text: 4: Teacher's Choice - Latin Poetry and Vergil's Aeneid, Excerpts from Books 1 and 2

skill.text: 1.B: Describe how grammar contributes to the meaning and function of Latin words and phrases in context.
